name: Grilled Butterflied Leg Of Lamb With Mint
keywords: dijon mustard, lamb, mint, main course
recipeIngredient: 1 leg of lamb (about six pounds), boned so that it lies flat
About 30 mint leaves (enough to cover the base of a serving dish)

recipeInstructions.text: Wipe lamb dry with paper towels and remove any large pieces of fat. In a small bowl, mix together mustard, soy sauce, olive oil, garlic, rosemary and pepper. Spread mixture over lamb on both sides. Refrigerate for three hours or overnight.

Preheat coal for grilling. Spread mint leaves on a serving dish so that they make a thick carpet. Lay lamb on a rack and grill seven to eight minutes on each side for medium rare. Cook longer for well done.
Place lamb on a board and slice pieces thin with a sharp knife. Arrange pieces on top of the mint in overlapping layers and serve.
